app.title: Bee Cell Annotation Tool
app.subtitle: Select images to start annotating bee cell types
app.description: A web-based tool for annotating bee cell types in honeycomb images

labels.select_category_hint: Select a category to view description

messages.canvas_init_failed: Failed to initialize Canvas, please refresh and try again
messages.image_load_failed: Image loading failed, please check if file exists
messages.click_within_image: Please click within the image area
messages.polygon_start: Polygon drawing started, double-click or press Esc to finish
messages.move_mode_tip: Drag mode: can pan view and move annotations
messages.circle_mode_tip: Circle annotation mode: click to add circle annotation
messages.polygon_mode_tip: Polygon annotation mode: click to add polygon vertices, double-click to finish
messages.clear_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all {count} annotations? This action cannot be undone.

eggs.name: Eggs
eggs.description: White oval-shaped, length ‚â§3mm, vertically attached to cell bottom

larvae.name: Larvae
larvae.description: White worm-like, length >3mm, visible body segments, open cells

capped_brood.name: Capped Brood
capped_brood.description: Light yellow wax cap, slightly convex surface, fine texture

pollen.name: Pollen
pollen.description: Colorful granular particles, rich colors (yellow, orange, red, etc.)

nectar.name: Nectar
nectar.description: Transparent liquid, open cells, clear liquid surface visible

honey.name: Honey
honey.description: Thick wax cap sealed, darker cap color, flat surface

other.name: Other
other.description: Empty cells, cells under construction, uncertain categories

honeycomb.name: Honeycomb
honeycomb.description: Honeycomb structure framework, hexagonal cell outline, cell skeleton

tools.move_mode: Move Mode (1): Drag to pan view, move annotations
tools.circle_mode: Circle Mode (2): Click to add circle annotation
tools.polygon_mode: Polygon Mode (3): Click to add vertices, double-click to finish
tools.tip: üí° Tip: You can drag to move circle annotations, adjust slider to change tool size. Supports undo operations (Ctrl+Z)

upload.title: Upload Images
upload.drag_drop: Drag and drop images here or click to select
upload.supported_formats: Supported formats: PNG, JPG, JPEG, BMP, TIF, TIFF
